fields.title: bagging
fields.pointers:
*  [Random forests](random_forests)  often achieve much better performance by introducing additional randomness.
*  [Boosting](boosting_vs_bagging)  is another classifier combination method which sounds similar to bagging, but is meant to improve accuracy rather than reduce variance.
* The  [bootstrap](bootstrap)  is another technique based on randomly resampling a dataset.
fields.summary: Bagging is a technique for reducing the variance of a learning algorithm by averaging the predictions obtained from random resamplings of the training data. It can improve the performance of unstable algorithms such as decision trees.
